name: Oliver & Company
description:
Oliver & Company is an arcade game developed by Coktel Vision and Nathan Logiciel. It was originally released in 1989. It was published by Coktel Vision.
Oliver & Company is available on PC.
It was produced by Kathleen Gavin. George Scribner directed the game. Barry Manilow, Barry Mann, Bruce Sussman and Charlie Midnight scored the game.
